item.description:
The tickets for this are on sale already. The show time is 7:30. I strongly advise you to buy your tickets in advance. This may be a bit crazy. Last time, the movie sold out pretty quick. I would like to head in to find seats at 7, Let's start gathering around 6:45.

Ok someone had to schedule this meetup....the ultimate chick flick...so here goes! I strongly recommend that when tickets do become available that you buy in advance.

I will be wearing a Boston Movie Group Badge. This could get crazy. We may have to wait in line, so look for me. If the movie is showing downstairs, which is pretty likely, I will be waiting as close to the ropes near the concession stand as they let me. If it is upstairs, I will grab a table at the top of the escalators to start, but we will probably need to line up to wait so we can get seats together.

We ususally go out after the movie to the Rockbottom, which has a full bar, so we can order fun cocktails (like cosmos) instead of beer if we want to in honor of the movie.

If you miss us or we can't all sit together, we will regroup in the hallway after to discuss the movie and get a head count of all who want to go to the brewery.

Movie Details:

Sex and the City 2

Release Date: May 27, 2010
Studio: New Line Cinema (Warner Bros.)
Director: Michael Patrick King
Screenwriter: Michael Patrick King
Starring: Sarah Jessica Parker, Kim Cattrall, Kristin Davis, Cynthia Nixon, Chris Noth, David Eigenberg, Evan Handler, Jason Lewis, Mario Cantone, Willie Garson
Official Website:
http://www.sexandthec...

Plot Summary: Carrie, Samantha, Charlotte and Miranda take another bite out of the Big Apple in the sequel to the 2008 summer blockbuster.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a Boston Movie Group Badge
item.name: Sex and the City 2
